section.title: Introduction:
section.paragraph: This directory is intended to hold any documentation that relates to Cinder’s Command Line Interface. Note that this directory is intended for basic descriptions of the commands supported, similar to what you would find with a ‘man page’. Tutorials or step-by-step guides should go into ‘doc/source/admin’ or ‘doc/source/user’ depending on the target audience.
The full spec for organization of documentation may be seen in the OS Manuals Migration Spec <https://specs.openstack.org/openstack/docs-specs/specs/pike/os-manuals-migration.html>.
